subject: RS 12-469 Questions on How to Use
author: Rita
full_text:
Hi Everyone,

New to group here.  We just completed the advance hack on our 469 
model.  Are you supposed to hear the voices from the radio stations or 
just white noise?

Also, is it best to hook up an external speaker, one or two, in order 
to record to a digital recorder?  What is the best way to record, using 
digital recorder, or direct into PC using Sound recorder, and using a 
line in/line out connection?

What is the recommended length of sessions.  Should I try just a minute 
or two, or longer at one sitting?

Thanks to all!
Rita
